branchCategory.name: Fittings
branchCategory.description: <p>Antistatic One-touch fittings series KA has one-touch loading and unloading. Series KA can be used in copper-free applications and in vacuum (max. -100kPa). Conductive resin is used for body and seals in fittings and tubing. Series KA is flame resistant (UL94 standard, V-0).</p>
